ca.eandb.jmist.framework.display.visualizer

Class StaticColorVisualizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.eandb.jmist.framework.display.visualizer.StaticColorVisualizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ColorVisualizer, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LinearChannelVisualizer

    public abstract class StaticColorVisualizer
extends Object
implements ColorVisualizer
    A ColorVisualizer that does not change its visualization function.
    Author:
    Brad Kimmel

      • analyze

        public final boolean analyze(Iterable<Color> samples)
        Description copied from interface: ColorVisualizer
        Analyzes the provided Color samples for automatically adjusting the visualization function.
        Specified by:
        analyze in interface ColorVisualizer
        Parameters:
        samples - The Color objects to analyze.
        Returns:
        A value indicating if the visualization function has changed as a result of the analysis. If true, then Color objects previously converted to RGB should be re-converted.
